subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
Veterinary Medicine
lead_paragraph: A jockey and a steward face sanctions for not scratching Life at Ten, who showed signs of distress before the Ladies’ Classic on Nov. 5 and finished last.
snippet: A jockey and a steward face sanctions for not scratching Life at Ten, who showed signs of distress before the Ladies’ Classic on Nov. 5 and finished last.
